content: repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 2 p1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 repeat row 1 and 2 throughout for 1x1 rib pattern with selvedge sts work 12 12 12 16 16 row in 1x1 rib switch to second largest needle us #10/6 00mm 24 in-32 in/60- 80 cm circular needle and continue working according to color pattern pg 4 and using charts 1 and 2a back charts through row 104 104 104 102 104 where indicated in color pattern you have already worked the first 12 12 12 16 16 row of the color pattern before switching to the larger needle armhole shaping row 105 105 105 103 105 bo6 at beginning of next 2 row then bobble 2 sts at the beginning of the next 2 row 79 81 95 105 115 sts remain decrease 1 st at each side on every rs row 2 times as follows k1 ssk work in 1x1 rib pattern to last 3 sts k2tog k1 after all decreases complete 75 77 91 101 111 sts remain work even through row 141 141 143 149 153 neck row 142 142 144 150 154 ws working in mc work 25 26 30 34 37 sts in 1x1 rib bo25 25 31 33 37 sts work to end in 1x1 rib work both sides of neck separately the right side first place the sts for the left side of the neck on a holder for later working decrease for right side of neck row 1 & 3 rs work to last 3 sts in 1x1 rib k2tog k1 row 2 & 4 ws work even in 1x1 rib 23 24 28 32 35 sts remain for shoulder bobble all sts in 1x1 rib decrease for left side of neck attach yarn at outside edge with ws facing row 1 & 3 ws work even in 1x1 rib row 2 & 4 rs k1 ssk work to end in 1x1 rib 23 24 28 32 35 sts remain for left shoulder bobble all sts in 1x1 rib www andreaknits com the dude 6 copyright © andrea rangel 2013 left front work entirely in 1x1 rib with selvedge sts at both sides with second-smallest needle and mc co 43 45 51 55 61 row 1 k1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 2 p1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 repeat row 1 and 2 throughout for 1x1 rib pattern with selvedge sts work 12 12 12 16 16 row in 1x1 rib switch to second largest needle us #10/6 00mm 24 in 32 in circular needle and continue working according to color pattern pg 4 through row 104 104 104 102 104 armhole shaping next row rs bobble 6 sts work to end in 1x1 rib pattern ws row work even in 1x1 rib pattern next rs row bobble 2 sts work to end in 1x1 rib pattern 35
